content: **all proceeds raised from pattern sales of my pet clothing and acessories line will be donated to animal shelters and other organizations that help animals in need ** tyler s cabled vest is made up of 2 pieces a cabled back panel and a stocking stitch/ribbed tummy panel when the panels are sewn together openings are left for the front legs the 8 row cable repeat is easy to follow and makes up into a nice warm vest one skein of plymouth yarn s galway or 200 yards of any worsted weight yarn will make the small size vest i also have a free pattern for coordinating cabled fingerless mitts so you can match your puppy
